english.segment1: Settle down. It's time to make my move. A sunny sky. Another day with you. It's closer now than ever was. I'm letting go of everything so
english.segment2: [Chorus]. She's got room for flying. Captures almost everything she tries for. She's got room for flying. Captures your soul, she's around you. She won't hurt you at all.
english.segment3: A troubled mind'. Is more than I could lose. And more than once. It's tried to foil my mood. It's closer now than ever was. Another sign I'm yet to find but
english.segment4: She's got room for flying. Captures almost everything she tries for. She's got room for flying. Captures your soul, she's around you. She won't hurt you at all.
